code: import React from'react';import{Divider,Layout,Typography}from'antd';import{useCrypto}from'../../context/crypto-context';import{render}from'@testing-library/react';import PortfolioChart from'../PortfolioChart';import AssetsTable from'../AssetsTable';import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const contentStyle={textAlign:'center',minHeight:'calc(100vh - 60px)',color:'#fff',backgroundColor:'#001529',padding:'1rem'};const AppContent=()=>{const{assets,crypto}=useCrypto();const cryptoPirceMap=crypto.reduce((acc,c)=>{acc[c.id]=c.price;return acc;},{});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Layout.Content,{style:contentStyle,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Typography.Title,{lebel:3,style:{textAlign:"left",color:'#fff'},children:["Portfolio:",' ',assets.map(asset=>asset.amount*cryptoPirceMap[asset.id]).reduce((acc,val)=>acc+=val,0).toFixed(2),"$"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PortfolioChart,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AssetsTable,{})]})});};export default AppContent;
